text: 2019 AFF Invitational Futsal Club Championship is the fifth edition of AFF Futsal Club Championship. The tournament was held in Nakhon Ratchasima, Thailand from 18 to 23 June 2019. The title of the tournament was also changed into AFF Futsal Cup. The defending champion is Bangkok BTS but they didn't take part in this edition. == Participants == ===Group A=== {| class="wikitable" |- !width=100|Association !width=200|Team |- | Thailand |PTT Chonburi Bluewave |- | Vietnam |SS Khánh Hòa |- | Indonesia |Black Steel Manokwari |} ===Group B=== {| class="wikitable" |- !width=100|Association !width=200|Team |- | Malaysia |Melaka United |- | Myanmar |MIU |- | Cambodia |Downtown Sport |} == Group stage == All times are local, WIB (UTC+7). ===Group A=== ===Group B=== ==Fifth place match== ==Knockout stage== ===Bracket=== ===Semi-Finals=== ===Third place match=== ===Final=== == Winner == ==Final standings== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" !width=40|Rank !width=180|Team |- align=center | |style="text-align:left;"| PTT Chonburi Bluewave |- align=center | |style="text-align:left;"| SS Khánh Hòa |- align=center | |style="text-align:left;"| MIU |- align=center | 4 |style="text-align:left;"| Downtown Sport |- align=center | 5 |style="text- align:left;"| Melaka United |- align=center | 6 |style="text-align:left;"| Black Steel Manokwari |- align=center |} == References == Category:AFF Futsal Club Championship Category:International futsal competitions hosted by Thailand Category:Sport in Nakhon Ratchasima Province AFF Futsal Club Championship AFF Futsal Club Championship
